definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hollowPurple</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">35</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hollowDistance</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="play_animation"><field name="active">&& !animation.isActive()</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hollowpurple</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
